haReport:
This mission was flown by:
Kmdr Patrik Schorner
Obltn Oswald Fromm
Ltn Detlef Schwarzer
Ltn Augustus Kass

 The mission was flown from Balatre,E Roye aerodrome.

Successes include the following: 
On 08/10/1916 near Puisieux.
A F.E.2b of No 8 Squadron RFC was brought down by Wenzel Scheiner of Jasta 16b.
2nd Lt Glenn Leynham was killed in action.
Lt Elroy Eglisfeld was killed in action.
Wenzel Scheiner was  flying a Albatros D.II.

On 08/10/1916 near Chauny.
A F.E.2b of Esc 21 was brought down by Rudiger Bretschneider of Jasta 16b.
Cpl Joseph Vertadier was killed in action.
S/Lt Eugene Kriegel was killed in action.
Rudiger Bretschneider was  flying a Albatros D.II.
